definition: A quality or characteristic that involves self-control, orderliness, and adherence to rules or regulations, often associated with maintaining focus, structure, and organization in various aspects of life, such as work, education, or personal routines. It is commonly used to describe the ability to stay committed, follow instructions, and maintain a systematic approach towards achieving goals or objectives.
